SEARCH
Module org.autogui
Package org.autogui.swing.util

Class SettingsWindow

java.lang.Object
org.autogui.swing.util.SettingsWindow
public class SettingsWindow extends Object
a shared window manager for the setting panel. it needs to explicitly dispose once the instance obtained

    static class

    an action for changing the selected directory of SettingsWindow.FileDialogManager

    SettingsWindow.FileDialogManager
    a shared dialog, can be obtained by getFileDialogManager().
    static interface 
    SettingsWindow.FileDialogManagerListener
    the callback interface for SettingsWindow.FileDialogManager in order to save and load history of files to preferences
    static class 
    SettingsWindow.FileItemRenderer
    a list renderer for history of files of SettingsWindow.FileDialogManager
    static class 
    SettingsWindow.FileListAddAction
    an action for adding the selected file to history of files of SettingsWindow.FileDialogManager
    static class 
    SettingsWindow.FileListClearAction
    an action for clearing history of files of SettingsWindow.FileDialogManager

    SettingsWindow.FileListModel
    a list-model for history files of SettingsWindow.FileDialogManager

    SettingsWindow.LabelGroup
    a group of labels
    static class 
    SettingsWindow.SettingsFrame
     
    static interface 
    SettingsWindow.SettingSupport
    the callback interface for SettingsWindow in order to save and load preferences of the window
